abstract: rapper fredo santana dead at 27 - report .
article: rapper fredo santana has reportedly died , aged 27 . the death of the hip-hop artist , real name derrick coleman , was announced on instagram on saturday by record producer and rapper maxo kream . `` damn man i 'm lost for words right now i 'm cryin my a * s off fredo i love yu b *** h rip a real savage , '' he captioned a photo of the rapper . fredo had appeared in drake 's video for hold on , we 're going home , where he played a man who kidnapped the star 's girlfriend .

the hotline bling hitmaker has also shared a tribute to fredo on instagram , posting a snap of him with the rapper along with the caption : `` rest in peace santana . '' in spite of the online messages , there has been no official confirmation of fredo 's death . back in october , fredo had spoken publicly about his health battle after being rushed to hospital with liver and kidney failure . he revealed the news on instagram from his hospital bed , stating : `` been in here since friday doctor say a n *** a had kidney failure an liver failure . ''

as a result , he explained that a highly anticipated collaboration with his cousin chief keef - called turbo bandana - would be delayed . `` thanks for everyone who prayed for a n *** a i would n't wish this on my worse enemy , '' he added .
